description: Growth in spending is set to continue, sparking fears of default rates going up as economy slows. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Credit card spending on the rise in S’pore, but debts remain manageable
title_page: Credit card spending on the rise in S’pore, but debts remain manageable | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – Consumers are spending more on their credit cards, and this trend is set to continue in 2023, according to market players.
Market players said the situation is under control so far. Default rates are low and there are measures in place to prevent consumers from falling deep into debt.
